review: My Amazon Fire TV arrived about 5 days after I ordered. First thing that surprised me was that it had my Amazon account information already on the set which was cool, lucky it was for me and not a gift. Very easy to setup and download the apps I want, i also installed XBMC which runs flawlessly.  I have a Roku3 in the front room, a Ouya out front... bonus the Ouya controllers will pair with the Fire TV WOO HOO!  I also have Wii, Xbox 360 and Xbox One so you can see i am very familiar with this type of media players.I very much recommend this media player.
